Player History
Had first career hit on 4/12/1985, off Mike Mason (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/1985, off Bob Ojeda (BOS)...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,150,714 through salary arbitration...
10/24/1987: Signed a contract extension with Kansas City, $480,000 per year, for 1 years.
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/3/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Injured on 5/12/1989 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Seattle to Atlanta on 6/9/1990 (Going to ATL: LF Darryl Motley. Going to SEA: CF Willie McGee, P Frank Rodriguez, P Anthony Telford)...
6/24/1990: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $1,810,000 per year, for 2 years.
